title: Dungeon Hallway
description:
You make your way out into the dungeon hallway.  Which way do you go?

To the NORTH of you is a closed Jail Cell.
To the SOUTH is the jail cell you came from.
To the EAST is the rest of the hallway.
To the WEST at the end of the hall is a closed door with a stool and bucket to the side of it.
